translation.en: Bye, bitch!
-Hi, bitch! -[agent grunts]
Actually? Cute.
-Yes! [laughs] -[agents cheering]
Four minutes, nine seconds. An agency record.
Like I said, he's the best of the best. My baby's about to hunt the Taliban.
translation.ko: 말씀드렸듯이 최고 중 최고입니다 내 새끼가 탈레반 쫓으러 간다!

translation.en: [Chunley] The American Intelligence Agency is proud to announce
the addition of 30 new cadets
translation.ko: 미 정보국에서 자랑스럽게 선언합니다 "2011년 졸업" 곧 30명의 생도가 현장에 비밀 작전 요원으로 투입됩니다

translation.en: who are about to enter the field as covert operatives,
translation.ko: 곧 30명의 생도가 현장에 비밀 작전 요원으로 투입됩니다

translation.en: including an all-time record two women.
One hot and one… funny.
translation.ko: 섹시 쪽 하나, 웃긴 쪽 하나

translation.en: But enough about diversity. Our 2011 valedictorian,
translation.ko: 다양성 이야기는 이쯤 하고 우리의 2011년 졸업생 대표

translation.en: Agent Steve Maryweather!
Wow, just wow. Thank you so much.
I'm very fortunate to be receiving this award
the same year "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" was repealed.
translation.ko: 이 상을 받게 되어 정말 행운으로 생각합니다

translation.en: Because now I can stand before you and accept this honor as my true self.
translation.ko: 덕분에 여러분 앞에 참된 모습으로 이 영광을 받을 수 있기 때문이죠

translation.en: None of you asked, but I'm sure as hell gonna tell.
translation.ko: 누구도 묻지 않았지만 전 확실히 말하겠습니다!

translation.en: I, Steve Maryweather,
the valedictorian of your class, and the future of the Agency,
translation.ko: 여러분의 졸업생 대표이자 우리 기관의 미래는

translation.en: am a gay man!
And I look forward to serving my country with all of my big gay heart.
translation.ko: 제 온 게이 마음을 다해서 나라를 섬길 날이 기다려지네요

translation.en: I'd like to thank the AIA, Céline Dion, and those Marky Mark Calvin Klein ads
translation.ko: AIA와 셀린 디옹, 마키 마크 캘빈클라인 광고에 감사드립니다

translation.en: for making me the man I am-- [grunts]
Will you look at this, there was a mistake.
We just, uh, re-crunched the numbers,
and Maryweather isn't the valedictorian after all. It's actually, uh…
-Agent Buck, who happens to be straight. -[audience murmuring]
But that's not what's going on. It's legit. Okay, Agent Buck.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 이유가 아니라 진짜입니다, 자, 벅 요원!

translation.en: Tough break, Maryweather. -Or should I say Agent Mary? -[audience laughing]
translation.ko: 아쉽게 됐군, 메리웨더 아니면 이렇게 부를까? 메리 요원!

translation.en: Give it up for Agent Mary, everybody.
-[man 1] Mary! -Oh, my God.
[man 2] Agent Mary!
You're young, just hang in there.
In ten years, you'll be running this place.
Of course I respect your decision, Director Chunley.
At the very least, I hope this little incident won't affect my posting.
translation.ko: 그저 최소한의 바람으로 파견에 영향은 없으면 해서요

translation.en: Don't get your panties in a wad, Mary.
I have the perfect assignment for you. You'll be running your own division.
translation.ko: 마침 딱 맞는 자리가 있어 자네 부서를 관리하게 될 거야

translation.en: What? That's amazing. Where? Moscow? Beijing?
translation.ko: 와, 정말 잘됐네요 어딘가요? 모스크바? 베이징?

translation.en: Got it.
Thirty terrorists were captured in a raid outside Kinshasa last night.
translation.ko: "뉴스 속보" 어젯밤 킨샤사 외곽 지역 급습으로 테러리스트 30명이 붙잡혔습니다

translation.en: Details about the mission are classified,
but the White House expressed their admiration
for those agents on the frontline.
Hey, dildo! Just met the president. Again. He's, like, obsessed with me.
translation.ko: 안녕, 딜도, 방금 대통령님 만났다 또 말이야, 나한테 푹 빠졌다니까

translation.en: Ten years in the field, three Medals of Honor…
Remind me, who's head of the class now?
-Mr. Air-B-B man. -Oh, there you are.
We are looking everywhere for you, Air-B-B man.
Well, you found me. Uh, you might wanna cover up, though.
translation.ko: 네, 찾으셨네요 근데 뭐 좀 걸치셔야겠어요

translation.en: Public nudity is a no-no in America.
We are not ashamed. We are vacation.
So, here's the thing. We need more towel, bad.
translation.ko: 아무튼 중요한 건 말이죠 수건이 더 필요해요

translation.en: Ja, we used them all. The towel.
Oh, absolutely. I'll have fresh towels for you after work.
translation.ko: 물론이죠, 퇴근하고 새 수건 갖다 드릴게요

translation.en: Wow, wow, wow. You are so strong. What is your job?
translation.ko: 와, 힘이 엄청 좋겠네요 직업이 뭐예요?

translation.en: Are you a rough guard at one of your famous American prisons?
translation.ko: 미국 유명한 감옥에서 거친 교도관으로 일해요?

translation.en: No, I'm… I'm actually an interior designer.
Uh, and I'm actually late. I'll see you later.
-All right, squad, assemble! -[Deb] Sup, Mar?
I'll tell you what's up. It's the best day of the month
translation.ko: 그럼, 왔지 드디어 이번 달 최고의 날이야

translation.en: for the best spies in the world.
That's right, people, I'm talking Check-In Day!
translation.ko: 그래, 여러분 상황 보고의 날이 왔어!

translation.en: Up first, standing five-foot-eight, weighing in at…
I wanna say a strong 165?
Bitch, I'm a dense 198, and I worked hard for every pound.
translation.ko: 뭐래, 꽉 찬 90kg이에요 1kg도 빠짐없이 노력의 결과죠

translation.en: -Take it away, Agent Deb. -Thank you very much.
translation.ko: 네 차례야, 데브 요원 고마워요, 내가 생각해 봤는데 우리 팀이 임무를 맡으면…

translation.en: So, I've been thinking. Should our squad ever work a mission--
translation.ko: 고마워요, 내가 생각해 봤는데 우리 팀이 임무를 맡으면…

translation.en: Which we will, 'cause we're the best.
[Deb] Which we will, 'cause we're the best.
How are we gonna get there? If you ask me, what this scrappy little spy squad needs
translation.ko: 어떻게 이동할까요? 내 생각에 우리 오합지졸 스파이팀에는

translation.en: is a super high-tech,
blow-your-fucking-mind-out-your-ass spy car!
translation.ko: 머리가 존나 뻔쩍 핑 도는 스파이 자동차가 필요해요

translation.en: Oh, my God, yes!
Wow! That looks… sturdy.
Because it fucking is.
The body is a 2006 Subaru Outback.
And on the inside, it can drive, it can fly…
translation.ko: 그리고 내부는 주행 가능, 비행도 가능

translation.en: …plus, it's pre-loaded with Tracy Chapman's entire discography,
translation.ko: 거기에 트레이시 채프먼 전곡까지 완벽 구비

translation.en: so you know it's a "Fast Car."
-Who's Tracy Chapman? -I think he's a senator.
Deb, you're a fucking genius. And I'm a fucking genius for recruiting you.
translation.ko: 데브, 넌 존나 천재야 널 선발한 나도 존나 천재고

translation.en: -Say it again. -No time, too excited.
translation.ko: - 다시 말해줘요 - 시간 없어, 너무 신났거든

translation.en: Genius number two, you're up. It's the Duchess of the Hack-Pack.
translation.ko: 2번 천재, 네 차례야 일명 해킹 무리의 공작

translation.en: -Our very own Dongle-Goblin. -That one's fine.
I'm talking about Agent Stat, people. Show me what you got.
translation.ko: 스탯 요원이라고, 여러분 어디 한번 보여줘

translation.en: I found that Malaysian plane everyone was looking for way back when.
translation.ko: 옛날에 사람들이 찾던 말레이시아 실종기 찾았어요 뭐? 세상에, 정말이야? 거길 볼 생각은 어떻게 했어?

translation.en: What? Oh, my God, what are you saying? How did you even think to look there?
translation.ko: 뭐? 세상에, 정말이야? 거길 볼 생각은 어떻게 했어?

translation.en: Now, it's check-in time for our Master of Disguises.
translation.ko: 자, 이제 다음은 변장의 마스터 차례야

translation.en: Wait, has anyone seen Twink?
[voice shaking] Would you like some chamomile, love?
For your nerves.
Thank you, Grandma Rose.
Wait a minute, Grandma Rose is dead! Trampled to death ten Black Fridays ago!
translation.ko: 잠깐, 할머니는 돌아가셨는데! 10번 전 블프 때 발에 밟혀서!

translation.en: Relax, booboo! It's me! Check-In Day realness, bitch.
translation.ko: 진정해요, 자기, 나예요! 감쪽같은 상황 보고잖아, 언니

translation.en: I mean "boss." But also "bitch," 'cause I love you, bitch.
Twink. [chuckles] That was amazing and very triggering.
translation.ko: 트윙크, 정말 끝내줬어 아픈 곳도 찌르고

translation.en: As always, you guys have blown me away with your check-ins.
translation.ko: 늘 그렇듯이 이번 상황 보고도 내 마음이 벅찰 정도야

translation.en: Now to close out Check-In Day with a bang, your boss who'd never forget to floss,
translation.ko: 이제 마무리 축포로 치실을 잊지 않는 여러분의 보스

translation.en: the best damn spy in the whole frickin' world,
translation.ko: 온 세상을 통틀어 열라 최고의 스파이

translation.en: give it up… for me!
I added 3.6 centimeters to my vertical leap.
That was my check-in.
Why is that paper-towel dispenser texting us?
Oh, my God, this is it! The Agency's taken notice of our progress,
translation.ko: 세상에, 이거야! 정보국에서 우리 실적을 봤나 봐

translation.en: and we're about to get our first case.
They're actually cutting our budget again, another 15%.
And now they're saying I have to reimburse them for this paper.
"Kill me"?
Oh, I forgot to tell you, I taught the printer how to feel.
That was gonna be next month's check-in.
Guys, remember, every week that we don't get a case,
translation.ko: 다들 기억해 임무가 들어오지 않는 한 주는

translation.en: we are one week closer to getting a case.
translation.ko: 임무가 들어오기까지 한 주 가까워진 거야

translation.en: I'm worried. I'm sure you can tell, but just in case you can't,
translation.ko: 걱정이에요, 눈치챘겠지만 못 챘을까 봐 말하자면

translation.en: the squad's morale is lower than my wife's singing voice.
translation.ko: 팀원들 의욕이 내 아내 노래 목소리보다 낮아요

translation.en: Wait, really? But that was such a killer check-in.
It was, but we've been busting our humps out here, and for nothing.
translation.ko: 끝내줬죠, 근데 우리가 뭐 빠져라 일해도 목적이 없잖아요

translation.en: We need to work a real case already.
Do you remember what you said when you recruited each of us?
That one day, we'd save the world. And I still believe that.
translation.ko: 언젠가 나라를 구할 거라고 했지 지금도 그렇게 믿어

translation.en: But it's time for a reality check.
Now, I wasn't going to tell you this,
but Pep Boys offered me Assistant Manager again.
translation.ko: 펩 보이즈에서 또 부매니저 자리를 제안했어요

translation.en: And I'm thinking about taking it.
Deb, you'd leave? You're so much more than a mechanic, though.
translation.ko: 데브, 떠나려는 거야? 정비공만 하기엔 아깝잖아

translation.en: Dude, this whole thing is turning out to be more like a little club
translation.ko: 솔직히 지금 우리 하는 일은 무슨 동아리 같아요

translation.en: than a life of action and adventure.
We won't be on the sidelines forever. We're too good.
translation.ko: 언제까지 벤치 신세는 아닐 거야 실력이 좋잖아

translation.en: Something's gotta change, or you're gonna lose the rest of us real soon.
translation.ko: 변화가 필요해요 아니면 우리 다 떠날지도 몰라요

translation.en: Deb doesn't know what she's talking about.
Wait, what the fuck? Is that… a gray hair?
You're young, just hang in there.
In ten years, you'll be running this place. [echoing]
Oh, God. Oh. Don't mind me. Yeah.
Hope you enjoyed all your towels last night.
Ja, we did. And we used them all.
[mutters] I gotta get to work.
Ah, and how is your designing of the interior going?
Terribly, actually. It's going terribly. I mean, can you believe I haven't had a single…
translation.ko: 엉망이에요, 완전 끔찍해요 이게 말이 돼요? 여태 한 건도…

translation.en: design mission in ten years?
I'm the best of the best. I've surrounded myself with the greatest team of super…
translation.ko: 난 최고 중의 최고인데 내가 모집한 팀원도 전부 엄청난…

translation.en: designers in the world,
but the powers that be don't see us as valuable just because we're queer!
translation.ko: 근데 힘 있는 자들이 퀴어라고 우리 가치를 깎아내린다고요!

translation.en: Oh? Is there a lot of anti-LGBTQ discrimination
in the world of West Hollywood interior design?
Yeah. There is. And I'm sick of it.
translation.ko: 네, 그래요 이제 더는 못 참아요

translation.en: -We got your text. Everything okay? -Does this look okay?
translation.ko: - 문자 받았어요, 괜찮아요? - 이게 괜찮아 보여?

translation.en: Is that a toenail?
No, it's a gray hair. Because I'm old.
Our lives are passing us by. And it's time to do something about it.
translation.ko: 인생이 흘러가 버리고 있어 뭔가 조치를 취해야 해

translation.en: Botox? Tummy tuck? Squirt your ass-fat into your head?
translation.ko: 보톡스? 배 성형? 머리에 엉덩이 지방 쏘기?

translation.en: Better. Stat, fire up the Command Center,
translation.ko: 좀 낫네 스탯, 커맨드 센터 켜고

translation.en: initiate a secure video conference with West Coast HQ.
I'm gonna demand that we be assigned a case.
Ten years I've waited.
-And you've all stood by me. -[ringing] This ends today…
translation.ko: 너희 모두 내 옆에 있어 줬지 오늘로 끝이야

translation.en: Hey, girl!
Steve. It's great to hear from you.
How's my favorite tragic-story-of-wasted-potential doing?
translation.ko: 내가 제일 아끼는 '낭비된 재능의 비극 이야기' 주인공 잘 지내나?

translation.en: Good! So good. And may I say, Deputy Director V,
translation.ko: 그럼요! 정말 좋아요 그나저나 V 부국장님

translation.en: you're positively radiant today, but also still very young-looking.
translation.ko: 오늘 광채가 나십니다 여전히 젊어 보이시고요

translation.en: -Do I look like a pancake to you? -No, ma'am, you do not.
translation.ko: - 자네 내가 팬케이크로 보여? - 아뇨, 아닙니다

translation.en: Then stop buttering me up.
You're funny. You're always funny. I've always liked that about you.
translation.ko: 재밌으셔라, 늘 재밌으셔 늘 그 점이 좋았어요 우리 팀한테도 그래요

translation.en: I tell my team this all the time. "You know who's funny? Deputy Director V."
translation.ko: 늘 그 점이 좋았어요 우리 팀한테도 그래요 'V 부국장님 진짜 재밌으셔'

translation.en: So I've been thinking, you know what might be so neat? If we got a case.
translation.ko: 제가 생각해봤는데 이러면 참 좋을 거 같아요, 임무가 생기면요

translation.en: You know I love you, but I can't make any promises. I'll see what I can do.
translation.ko: 자넬 사랑하지만 장담은 못 해 일단 알아는 보겠네

translation.en: V. It's me. You know me.
Ten years ago, you told me I'd be running this agency by now.
translation.ko: 10년 전에 말씀하셨죠 지금이면 정보국을 지휘할 거라고

translation.en: But now I can't even get a case? I mean, look at this team I put together.
translation.ko: 근데 사건조차 못 받는다고요? 제가 모은 팀을 좀 보세요

translation.en: They're amazing. And you should be an ally.
translation.ko: 얼마나 훌륭하다고요 우리 지지자가 되어 주셔야죠

translation.en: You think I have it any easier?
I'm the only woman in this entire agency with any power.
translation.ko: 정보국에서 권력 쥔 여자는 나밖에 없어

translation.en: The next highest-ranking woman is Joanie, the pasta chef in the cafeteria,
translation.ko: 나 다음으로 높은 여자는 구내식당 파스타 셰프 조니야

translation.en: and her pasta sucks, and everybody hates her.
I know you're frustrated. But it's just a matter of time.
Opportunities don't come on a schedule.
-[phone chimes] -Oops! But interrogations do.
Okay, I'll say it. She looked good.
translation.ko: 그래, 대놓고 말할게요 외모 진짜 예술

translation.en: She has gray hairs, too. You just can't see them because all our screens suck.
translation.ko: V도 흰머리 있어 우리 화질이 구려서 안 보인 거야

translation.en: You know what? Enough waiting to see what they can do for us.
translation.ko: 안 되겠어, 남들이 해주길 기다리기도 이제 끝이야

translation.en: Let's show them what we can do for them, huh? Today, we go rogue!
translation.ko: 우리가 해줄 수 있는 걸 보여주자 오늘은 일탈이다!

translation.en: Wait, what?
You heard me. I'm going rogue! Who's with me?
translation.ko: 내 말 들었잖아 일탈할 거야, 같이할 사람?

translation.en: Are you guys ready to live this freaking dream already?
translation.ko: 꿈꾸던 걸 현실로 살고 싶지 않아?

translation.en: The Navy had me in an office, pushing pencils,
and you saw what I could really be.
And when you showed up in my life, I was at rock bottom.
translation.ko: 메리가 내 삶에 나타났을 때 난 바닥에 있었어요

translation.en: But look at me now. I'm in a garage!
translation.ko: 근데 지금 날 봐요 차고에 있잖아!

translation.en: [sighs] Technically, I have to do everything you tell me to, or I'll go back to prison.
translation.ko: 난 하라는 대로 할 수밖에 없어요 아니면 감옥에 돌아가니까

translation.en: Yes! Oh, this is going to be amazing.
We're gonna prove how great we are once and for all.
Now, step one of finding a case, find a case. So who's got one?
translation.ko: 자, 임무 찾기 첫 단계 '임무 찾기', 있는 사람?

translation.en: Counterfeit Crocs are flooding the market.
translation.ko: 짝퉁 크록스 재고 때문에 시장 가격이 엉망이에요

translation.en: I believe a foreign power is trying to undermine the integrity of our insoles.
translation.ko: 외국 세력이 우리 깔창의 탄력성을 깎아내리려는 모양이에요

translation.en: Mmm. Seems like a big leap. Anyone else?
translation.ko: 그건 아닌 거 같은데 다른 사람?

translation.en: Before I can give you my pitch, what is your definition of treason?
translation.ko: 내 아이디어 말하기 전에 메리의 반역죄 정의는 뭐예요?

translation.en: -Betraying your country or government. -Yeah, I got nothing.
translation.ko: - 국가나 정부를 배신하는 거 - 난 없어요

translation.en: Okay, I have two things.
One is, I met this guy last night who I suspect is a terrorist.
translation.ko: 하나, 어젯밤 만난 남자가 있는데 왠지 테러리스트 같아요

translation.en: And the other idea is, okay, did you guys all know that raisins are grapes?
translation.ko: 그리고 다른 하나는 건포도가 포도였단 거 알았어요?

translation.en: What was the first one?
-They're grapes first, and then-- -The terrorist!
Oh, yes. He was a little suspicious.
[Twink] It was my eleven o'clock show,
and I was doing something groundbreaking with my hair…
Red!
All of a sudden, a man in the audience caught my eye.
translation.ko: 그러다 갑자기 관객 한 명이 눈에 들어왔어요

translation.en: The first thing I noticed is that he'd covered up some pretty nasty bruises
translation.ko: 첫째로 알아챈 건 얼굴이랑 목에 멍이 많았는데

translation.en: on his face and neck with makeup,
and let's just say he's no me with the concealer. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 다만 컨실러 바르는 실력이 '나'스럽지 못한 거죠

translation.en: And I saw a metal briefcase cuffed to his wrist,
translation.ko: 근데 손목에 수갑으로 채운 금속 서류 가방이 보였어요

translation.en: and tattoos on his chest written in Kazakh.
I'm a little rusty, but I'm pretty sure they said,
translation.ko: 내 실력이 좀 녹슬긴 했지만 이런 뜻이 분명해요

translation.en: "Anarchy will grow from the blood of the uninitiated."
-But I could be wrong. -This actually sounds like something.
translation.ko: - 근데 틀릴 수도 있어요 - 확실히 뭔가 있는 것 같은데

translation.en: We could tail him, figure out what's in the briefcase.
translation.ko: 뒤를 밟아도 되겠어 가방에 뭐가 들었나 보는 거야

translation.en: If he's actually planning anarchy or terrorism, he needs to be stopped.
translation.ko: 정말로 무정부나 테러를 노린다면 누군가 막아야 해

translation.en: But we need a lead.
A way to find this one gay guy hiding somewhere in Southern California.
translation.ko: 서던캘리포니아 어딘가에 숨어 있는 게이 남자를 찾을 방법

translation.en: Grindo!
Yup. Should be easy. I bet he hit me up already.
translation.ko: 그래, 완전 쉽죠 이미 나한테 연락 왔을 듯

translation.en: Scrolling, scrolling, scrolling…
Sorry, I'm, like, extremely popular on here.
-Twink. -Respect my work-life balance. I'm trying to have it all. Ah! Here he is.
translation.ko: 워라밸 존중해 줘요! 전부 잡을 거라고요, 찾았다!

translation.en: Alert HQ that WeHo is on a case!
[JJ] We need your decisions on all these missions.
Yes, yes, no, abort. Tell this one to go fuck itself, but in Russian.
translation.ko: 허가, 허가, 안 돼, 중단 얜 나가 뒈지라고 해, 러시아에서

translation.en: -Yes, ma'am. -[device ringing]
What the hell were you thinking? You know I don't want Q-Force in the field.
translation.ko: 자네 대체 무슨 생각인가? 현장에 Q-포스는 안 된다니까

translation.en: -They're a liability. -What the hell is Q-Force?
The queers! Your fucking Lollipop Brigade in West Hollywood.
translation.ko: 퀴어들 말이야! 자네가 좋아 죽는 웨스트할리우드 롤리팝 무리

translation.en: I didn't assign them a case. Sounds like two of your heart meds are fighting with each other again.
translation.ko: 전 임무 내린 적 없습니다 또 심장약끼리 싸움이라도 나셨나

translation.en: [Chunley] Watch your mouth, little lady.
Need I remind you that they're too soft for active duty?
translation.ko: 다들 약해 빠져서 현장 근무 못 하는 거 몰라?

translation.en: What if somebody sprains their pronoun?
I just spoke to Maryweather today. This has to be a misunderstanding.
translation.ko: 오늘 메리웨더와 이야기 나눴는데 오해가 있었나 봅니다

translation.en: I don't misunderstand shit! Never have, never will.
translation.ko: 난 오해 같은 거 안 키워! 여태 그랬고 앞으로도!

translation.en: Fix this, or there will be hell to pay!
translation.ko: 당장 고쳐놔! 호된 대가 치르기 싫으면!

translation.en: Damn it!
-JJ! Call me so I can hang up on you. -[JJ] Right away, ma'am.
translation.ko: - 제이제이, 확 끊어버리게 전화해 - 지금 합니다!

translation.en: -Damn it, JJ! Want it less! -[helicopter whirring]
Ignore the call. Once we solve the case, which we will, spectacularly,
translation.ko: 전화 무시해, 당연하지만 끝내주게 임무를 해결하고 나면

translation.en: she won't even care about the missed call. You can't argue with results.
translation.ko: 신경도 안 쓰실 거야 결과 앞에선 뭐라 못 하지

translation.en: [Stat] I'm in. I hacked his phone through Grindo.
-[Mary] Who else is he communicating with? -He's only received two texts.
translation.ko: - 또 누구랑 이야기 중이야? - 받은 문자는 두 개뿐이에요

translation.en: Both from a blocked number. The first one's a photo.
translation.ko: 둘 다 번호는 막혔는데 첫 문자는 사진이에요

translation.en: Avert your eyes. This might be an enormous…
[Mary] It's a location.
Phew. Okay. The second one's only one character long, the church emoji.
translation.ko: "로버트슨 대로" 좋아, 두 번째 문자는 한 글자예요 교회 이모지

translation.en: "Abbey" is a church term, right? Where the monks and nuns live.
Maybe it's a meetup at The Abbey, the gay bar.
translation.ko: 게이 바 애비에서 만나자는 걸 수도 있어

translation.en: Oh, my God, you guys, we solved it! Should we go out for drinks?
translation.ko: 어쩜 좋아, 우리가 해결했어요! 축하주 마시러 갈까요?

translation.en: We did not solve the case. That was the very first hint.
translation.ko: 아직 임무 해결 안 했어 이제 첫 힌트야

translation.en: Now, for my plan to work, we may need a distraction.
translation.ko: 자, 내 계획이 통하려면 주의를 끌 게 필요해

translation.en: [Twink] Say no more.
[as Ariana Grande] Ariana Grande ought to cause quite a stir in The Abbey.
The gays love me, and I love them.
translation.ko: 게이는 날 사랑하지 나도 그들을 사랑해

translation.en: Shout-out to my gay brother Frankie, who is gay.
translation.ko: 게이인 내 게이 오빠 프랭키 고마워!

translation.en: Deb, fire up the Mary-mobile.
Please, her name is Subaru McClanahan.
WeHo Sunset, no OJ, extra grenadine,
translation.ko: 위호 선셋, 오주 빼고 그레나딘 추가

translation.en: two lime wedges, splash of soda, sugar-free cola,
translation.ko: 라임 웨지 둘 소다 약간, 무설탕 콜라

translation.en: grapefruit bitters, 12 cherries, two frozen grapes, metal straw.
translation.ko: 자몽 비터, 체리 12개 얼린 포도 둘, 금속 빨대

translation.en: Excuse me, can I buy you a drink?
I already have one, but thank you forever.
What a hot accent you have.
[in English] Do not move one inch. I will make you pregnant so soon.
translation.ko: 절대 움직이지 말아요 금방이라도 임신시킬 테니까

translation.en: Just have to urine. I love you.
K. Sounds great. I'll be right here.
-Ariana Grande! Oh, my God! -[cheering]
[man] Ariana, can I get a selfie? I'm gay like your brother!
translation.ko: 아리아나, 셀피 하나만요! 나도 오빠처럼 게이예요!

translation.en: Get in line, bitch!
A present? For me? You shouldn't have.
translation.ko: 날 위한 선물? 뭐 이런 걸 다

translation.en: My love? How could you?
-[grunts] -Choke him!
-He's on the move! -[Deb] I'm right outside.
Tracker's online. He's on San Vicente, heading west by south-north.
translation.ko: 트래커 연결됐어요 산비센테 길 서미남북 방향

translation.en: West by south-north?
It's San Vicente, nothing about that street makes sense.
translation.ko: 산비센테잖아요 그 길은 원래 말이 안 돼요

translation.en: -Damn it! We're gonna lose him! -No, we're not.
Outback, Jet Mode!
Are you sure this can fly?
I haven't tested it yet. And I made the jet engines out of parts
translation.ko: 아직 테스트 안 해봤어요 제트 엔진 만드는 데

translation.en: from my air conditioner. My wife's gonna kill me for that.
translation.ko: 내 에어컨 썼고요 이제 와이프한테 죽었다

translation.en: [Deb] It's flying, though. I'm a genius!
[Mary] There he is.
Careful, or you'll fall for me all over again.
You guys missed it! After you left, Ariana debuted a brand new song
translation.ko: 다들 놓쳤잖아요! 가고 나서 아리아나가 새 노래 불렀는데

translation.en: called "Gimme Some Space, Homos, Geez." It's kinda great.
translation.ko: 제목 '숨 좀 쉬자, 게이들아, 참' 나름 짱이에요

translation.en: Where's Stat?
There you are. We need to decrypt… [shrieks]
Deputy Director V! [chuckles nervously] Perfect timing.
The way you just stepped out of those shadows? I mean, iconic.
translation.ko: 어둠 속에서 딱 나타나시는데 진짜 우리의 아이콘

translation.en: Your clearance is revoked. You're no longer agents of the AIA.
translation.ko: 자네 발령 취소됐어 더는 AIA 소속 요원이 아니네

translation.en: What? But we--
Let me put this in terms you'll understand.
Sashay away, agents.
Oh! Got it. That's bad.
Mary, what the hell were you thinking?
I was thinking that the time had come for us to actually do something with our lives.
translation.ko: 이제 우리 인생에서 뭔가를 해야 할 때가 왔다고 생각했어요

translation.en: I told you what to do.
Sit around and wait?
I did that for ten years and I don't want to do it for another ten.
translation.ko: 10년을 그렇게 했는데 10년을 더 하고 싶지 않아요!

translation.en: This job came before everything. My family, my friends, my dating life.
translation.ko: 전 늘 일이 우선이었어요 가족, 친구, 데이트도 제쳐두고

translation.en: I have too much to offer, and so does the rest of my squad.
translation.ko: 아직 못 보여준 게 많고 우리 팀원들도 마찬가지예요

translation.en: You don't get it. People like us can't break the rules.
translation.ko: 이해를 못 하나 본데 우리 같은 사람은 규칙을 어기면 안 돼

translation.en: We have to work twice as hard and wait twice as long to get our shot.
translation.ko: 우린 두 배로 일하고 기다려야 기회가 온다고

translation.en: I thought you were smart, Steve. But you just threw away everything I gave you.
translation.ko: 난 네가 똑똑한 줄 알았어, 스티브 근데 내가 준 전부를 내다 버렸군

translation.en: Your whole career. Your future, damn it! For nothing.
translation.ko: 지금까지의 커리어, 자네의 미래 젠장, 얻는 것도 없이!

translation.en: [Stat] Actually, not nothing.
The thumb drive contains top-secret schematics for some uranium mine.
translation.ko: USB에 우라늄광 일급비밀 설계도가 들어 있어요

translation.en: Plus a whole lot of other stuff behind some major encryption.
translation.ko: 암호화로 숨겨진 다른 정보도 엄청 많고요

translation.en: The guy who handed it off left prints, though. He's currently an intern in the Senate.
translation.ko: 이걸 넘긴 사람 지문이 남았는데 상원에서 인턴으로 일해요

translation.en: I'm sorry, what? You all foiled a possible black-market nuclear deal
translation.ko: 아니, 뭐라고? 자네들이 연방 정부와 엮인

translation.en: with a tie to the federal government?
Sounds like it. Guess we better… "pack up our fag shit" and head out.
translation.ko: 그런 것 같네요, 그럼 이만 우린 '게이 물건 싸 들고' 퇴장하죠

translation.en: All we ever wanted was the chance to do our jobs. Just like anyone else.
translation.ko: 우린 그저 다른 사람들처럼 일할 기회를 얻고 싶었을 뿐인데

translation.en: Get me Chunley.
What part of "shit-canned" do you not understand?
translation.ko: '짐 싸서 꺼져'라는 말 어디가 이해 안 되는 거지?

translation.en: Sir, if you'll just listen--
I don't have to listen to you, Deputy Director.
translation.ko: 난 자네 얘기 들을 필요 없어, 부국장

translation.en: Yes, motherfucker, you absolutely do.
Excuse me?
You're excused, but your behavior isn't.
Those agents deserve your attention, because they're damn good.
translation.ko: 저 요원들은 국장님 관심을 받을 자격 있습니다, 그만큼 뛰어나요

translation.en: This squad just uncovered an illegal nuclear arms deal
translation.ko: 이 팀이 방금 불법 핵무기 거래를 적발했는데

translation.en: that your pimply red ass didn't even know was in the works.
translation.ko: 그쪽 여드름 엉덩이는 작전이 일어나는지도 몰랐죠

translation.en: Now, unless you want a nuclear bomb in a terrorist's hands,
translation.ko: 테러리스트 손에 핵폭탄을 쥐여 주고 싶은 게 아니라면

translation.en: reinstate these agents' credentials immediately.
Why would I do that?
Because if they ever fuck up again, you can fire me.
translation.ko: 이 팀이 다시 한번 일을 조지면 내가 해고당해 드리죠

translation.en: That's a tasty offer. I like it. All right, fine.
translation.ko: 그거 구미가 당기는군 맘에 들어, 그래, 좋아

translation.en: Then Q-Force is back online. Sorry, that's what everybody calls you.
translation.ko: 그럼 Q-포스는 재가동이군 미안, 다들 자네들을 그렇게 불러

translation.en: Q for "queer." I'll make 'em stop.
I actually kind of like it.
Welcome back, Q-Force. And welcome to the chopping block, V. This is fun.
translation.ko: 잘 돌아왔다, Q-포스 도마에 오른 걸 환영해, V, 재밌군

translation.en: Thank you so--
Save it. I put my neck on the line for you this time, and I don't have another neck.
translation.ko: 됐어, 이번엔 자네를 위해 내 목을 걸었지만 내 목은 하나야

translation.en: So from now on, you do what I say.
And don't screen my fucking calls!
The Subaru of people.
She'd be such a gay icon if only her identity wasn't top secret.
translation.ko: 신원만 일급비밀 아니었으면 진짜 게이 아이콘이었을 텐데

translation.en: Ah. Uh, hey, you must be the new neighbor. This got delivered to us by mistake.
translation.ko: "메리웨더 디자인" 아, 새로 이사 오신 분이군요 이게 잘못 배달 왔길래요

translation.en: Oh, my God, yes. That thing is a… lamp.
Really? It's a really heavy lamp.
That's how you know it's good. [chuckles]
-I'm Steve, by the way. -Hey, I'm Benji.
I'll see you around, Benji.
Agent Maryweather, are you ready to see our brand-new headquarters?
translation.ko: 메리웨더 요원 새로운 본부 맞이할 준비됐어요?

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's beautiful!
The Agency's already sent us all sorts of high-tech gear.
translation.ko: 정보국에서 벌써 첨단기술 장비를 잔뜩 보냈어요

translation.en: I can't wait to get my crumbs and smudges all over it.
And I can stop hooking up with the coroner for free hair!
translation.ko: 난 공짜 머리 받으려고 검시관이랑 안 자도 되겠네!

translation.en: Now it can just be about the sex.
translation.ko: 이제 순전히 섹스만 할 수 있겠어

translation.en: I couldn't have done it without you guys.
Or you, lil guy.
Oh, my God, our first actual assignment from HQ!
translation.ko: 맙소사, 본부에서 받는 우리의 진짜 첫 임무야!

translation.en: We're officially on the case of the stolen uranium.
Hey, dildo. Nice office. Looks like a shitty garage in here.
translation.ko: 안녕, 딜도, 사무실 좋네 거지 같은 차고 꼴이야

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -[Buck] Chunley sent me.
translation.ko: - 네가 여기 왜 왔어? - 천리가 보냈어

translation.en: My orders were, "Go babysit the sodomites, and make sure they don't fuck up the entire world."
translation.ko: 남색들 돌보면서 세상 못 조지게 간수 잘하란 명령이었지

translation.en: I guess that makes me… your new boss.
translation.ko: 그러니까 내가 너희의 새 보스인 건가?

translation.en: We don't need you to babysit us, Buck.
Although,
I do think lots of people would pay $7.99 a month to watch him be my babysitter.
translation.ko: 7.99달러에 나 돌봐주는 거 볼 구독자는 많겠네요

translation.en: Why don't you just get the hell out of here and let us get on with saving the world?
translation.ko: 그냥 꺼지는 게 어때? 우리가 알아서 세상 구할 테니까

translation.en: I don't wanna be here any more than you want me to be here,
translation.ko: 네가 싫어하는 만큼 나도 여기 있기 싫어

translation.en: but you brought this on yourself.
You and the rest of the Spice Girls only have yourselves to blame.
translation.ko: 너랑 네 스파이스 걸스 멤버들 전부 자신을 탓하라고

translation.en: Who the hell are you calling a Spice Girl, bitch?
Deb, let me handle this.
Spice is hot, hot is a temperature, temperature is climate,
translation.ko: 스파이스는 핫하지, 핫은 기온이고 기온은 날씨야

translation.en: climate is change, and change is good. So thanks for the compliment.
translation.ko: 날씨는 변하고 변하는 건 좋아 그러니 칭찬 고맙다

translation.en: I think you should have just let Deb hit him.
translation.ko: 그냥 데브가 한 대 치게 두시지
